title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: The bug report does not provide any observed behavior.
EB: The setting of classpath / output location should be offered as one operation. The error message should say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
SR:
Step 1: Open the application.
Step 2: Navigate to the settings menu.
Step 3: Look for the option to set the classpath and output location.
Step 4: Note that it is currently set as two separate operations.
Step 5: Attempt to set the classpath and output location as one operation.
Step 6: Observe the error message and note that it is strange and should be revised.
